Relic Description: Vigor +1/2/3
Effect: Self-explanatory

Relic Description: Mind +1/2/3
Effect: Self-explanatory

Relic Description: Endurance +1/2/3
Effect: Self-explanatory
Notes: +2 / +4 / +6 Max Stamina

Relic Description: Strength/Dexterity/Intelligence/Faith/Arcane +1/2/3
Effect: Self-explanatory
Notes: 3 Arc adds ~5.4% of base bleed

Relic Description: Poise +1/2/3
Effect: Reduces incoming poise damage by 0.95x/0.9x/0.85x

Relic Description: Increased maximum HP/FP/Stamina
Effect: Increases vigor/mind/endurance by 5
Notes: +100 Max HP / 25 Max FP / 10 Max Stamina. Exclusive to (Dark) Night of the Fathom, Wise, Champion respectively

Relic Description: Improved [Status] Resistance
Effect: Increases specified status resistance by 75

Relic Description: Max FP Up with 3+ Staves/Sacred Seals Equipped
Effect: Increases mind by 10
Notes: +50 Max FP

Relic Description: Max HP Up with 3+ Small/Medium/Greatshields Equipped
Effect: Increases vigor by 10
Notes: +200 Max HP

Relic Description: Starting Weapon deals [element] Damage
Effect: Decreases starting weapon's physical AP by 30/40/50/60 and adds 33/44/55/66 elemental AP
Notes: The amount of damage taken away and added depends on weapon type. Does not affect weapon scaling. Does not stack with "Stating armament inflicts "x" status"

Relic Description: Stating armament inflicts "x" status
Effect: Decreases starting weapon's damage by 0.85x and adds 25 (blood) or 35 (poison/frost) buildup
Notes: Does not stack with "Starting Weapon deals [element] Damage"

Relic Description: Change compatible armament skill to [xxx] at start of expedition
Effect: Self explanatory

Relic Description: [Consumable] in possession at start of expedition
Effect: Self explanatory

Relic Description: Small pouch in possession at start of expedition
Effect: Self explanatory

Relic Description: Stonesword in possession at start of expedition
Effect: Self explanatory

Relic Description: Flask Also Heals Allies
Effect: Heals allies for 50% of flask HP in a radius
Notes: Currently bugged; sometimes has a chance to not heal the wearer. Will not heal teammates in iframes.

Relic Description: Item confer effect to all nearby allies
Effect: Self explanatory

Relic Description: Increase rune acquisition for self and allies
Effect: 1.035x rune gain for self and allies

Relic Description: Critical Hits Earn Runes
Effect: Gain 600 runes on critical hits

Relic Description: Attack power permanently increased for each evergaol prisoner defeated
Effect: Increases damage by 1.05x per Evergaol boss

Relic Description: Max FP increased for each Sorcerer's Rise unlocked
Effect: Increases max FP by 1.18x for each Sorcerer's Rise unlocked

Relic Description: Attack power up after defeating a Night Invader
Effect: Increases damage by 1.07x per invader

Relic Description: (Huge) Rune discount for shop purchases while on expedition
Effect: Provides a 10/20% discount at merchants
Notes: Different versions stack together. The same version does not stack with itself. "Huge" exclusive to Night of the Demon

Relic Description: Treasure marked upon map
Effect: Reveals hidden chest locations

Relic Description: Taking attacks improves attack power
Effect: 15% damage buff after taking a hit, for 10s. Duration refresh when getting hit again. Does not work if blocked

Relic Description: Physical Attack Up +0/1/2
Effect: Increases physical damage by 1.04x/1.05x/1.06x

Relic Description: Improved Melee Attack Power
Effect: Increases all attack power by 1.05x. Affects both weapon and skills.
Notes: Exclusive to Will of the Balancers and Will of Balance

Relic Description: Improved Skill Attack Power
Effect: Increases skill attack power by 1.15x
Notes: Exclusive to Will of the Balancers and Will of Balance

Relic Description: Magic/Fire/Lightning/Holy Attack Up +0/1/2
Effect: Increases magic/fire/lightning/holy damage by 1.045x/1.055x/1.065x

Relic Description: Improved stance breaking when two handing
Effect: Increases poise damage by 1.05x when 2 handing the weapon
Notes: Does not apply to bows.

Relic Description: Improved stance breaking while wielding two armaments
Effect: Increases poise damage by 1.05x when powerstancing (dual wielding 2 weapons of the same type)
Notes: Can confirm applies to ground L1 attack and jump L1.

Relic Description: Switching Weapons Adds an Affinity Attack
Effect: Adds 12 magic/fire/lightning/holy AP for 10 seconds
Notes: The element that is chosen is random. Exclusive to Night of the Lord.

Relic Description: Boosts Attack Power of Added Affinity Attacks
Effect: Increases magic/fire/lightning/holy AP by 1.1x
Notes: Rounds up. Exclusive to Night of the Lord, Golden Dew, and Dark Night of the Champion. Does not affect sorceries/incants. Works for any elemental damage on weapon, not just weapon buffs

Relic Description: Switching Weapons Boosts Attack Power
Effect: Increases physical damage by 1.1x for 10 seconds
Notes: Exclusive to Night of the Lord and Fell Omen Fetish.

Relic Description: Successive Attacks Boosts Attack Power
Effect: Increases damage by 1.05x / 1.065x / 1.09x on successive attacks
Notes: Exclusive to Glass Necklace

Relic Description: Attack power increases after using grease items
Effect: Increases physical damage by 1.1x for 30 seconds
Notes: Same duration as grease

Relic Description: Improved Initial Standard Attack
Effect: Increases the damage of the first light attack by 1.15x
Notes: Applies to 1H/2H R1 chain or paired weapon L1. Does not work for shield poke / rolling attack / jump attack

Relic Description: Improved Guard Counters
Effect: Increases guard counter damage by 1.17x

Relic Description: Guard counter is given a boost based on current HP
Effect: Damage boost varies linearly with % health remaining, but potency varies greatly between character, level and weapons.
Notes: Buff seems to scale off amount of HP, and is a flat amount per weapon type. Despite the confusing behaviour, this is an extremely potent buff for Guardian: ~30% buff at max level for commander's standard, and ~21.5% for Godfrey's Axe. For Raider, ~25.7% buff for commander's standard, and ~16.8% for Godfrey's Axe

Relic Description: Improved Critical Hits +0/1
Effect: Increases critical hit damage by 1.18x/1.23x
Notes:
Only applies to certain parts of critical hit. E.g. on colossal weapon, it only buffs the (stronger) second hit.
 +0 stack with +1 and +0 can stack with another +0 but +1 can not stack with itself as +1 exclusive to (Dark) Night of the Baron

Relic Description: Improved Throwing Pot/Knife/Stone/Perfuming Arts Damage
Effect: Increases pot/knife/stone/Perfuming Arts damage by 1.15x

Relic Description: Improved [Spell School] Sorcery/Incantation
Effect: Increases damage of specified school by 1.12x

Relic Description: Improves Roar and Breath attacks
Effect: Increases roar / breath damage by 1.15x.
Notes: Does not work for Raider character skill.

Relic Description: Improve [Weapon Type] attack power
Effect: Increase damage dealt by the specified weapon type by 1.09x (1.06x for bows)
Notes: Applies to weapon hit AoW (using said weapon). Does not apply to projectile AoW like thunderbolt, even when cast with said weapon type.

Relic Description: Improved Attack Power with 3 [Weapon Type] Equipped
Effect: Increases damage by the specified weapon type by 1.2x (1.1x for bows)
Notes: Works for damage from all sources. E.g. spells

Relic Description: Attack power up when facing frostbite/poison/rot afflicted enemy
Effect: Increases damage by 1.1x towards targets suffering specified status effect

Relic Description: Frostbite in Vicinity Conceals Self
Effect: Self explanatory
Notes: Exclusive to (Dark) Night of the Miasma

Relic Description: Poison & Rot in Vicinity Increases Attack Power
Effect: Increases damage by 1.12x for 20 seconds when poison or rot is triggered in the vicinity
Notes: Exclusive to Night of the Wise

Relic Description: Status Ailment Gauges Slowly Increase Attack Power
Effect:
Having any amount of status ailment gauge increases damage by 1.04x every 20 seconds (10 stacks). Resets after 30 seconds 
of no status gauge.
Notes: Exclusive to Night of Dregs

Relic Description: Attacks Inflict Rot When Damage Is Taken
Effect: Adds 25 rot buildup to the weapon for 12 seconds after taking damage
Notes: Exclusive to Night of Dregs

Relic Description: Improved Physical Damage Negation
Effect: Increases physical damage negation by 10%
Notes: Exclusive to Dark Night of the Miasma

Relic Description: Magic/Fire/Lightning/Holy Damage Negation Up
Effect: Increases magic/fire/lightning/holy damage negation by 10%

Relic Description: Improved Damage Negation at Low HP
Effect: Increases damage negation by 16% when HP is below 40%

Relic Description: Draw enemy attention while guarding
Effect: Increases aggro when holding the block button
Notes: Does not guarantee aggro

Relic Description: Improved Poise & Damage Negation When Knocked Back by Damage
Effect: Increases damage negation by 20% and reduces incoming poise damage by 0.8x for 20 seconds

Relic Description: Occasionally Nullify Attacks When Damage Negation is Lowered
Effect: Self explanatory. Chance of activation currently unknown
Notes: Exclusive to the Will of Balance (ED Balancer relic, unreleased)

Relic Description: Character Skill Cooldown +1/2/3
Effect: Reduces skill cooldown by 0.95x/0.925x/0.9x

Relic Description: Ultimate Art Gauge +1/2/3
Effect: Increases ultimate gauge gain by 1.05x/1.075x/1.1x
Notes: Only affects passive Ultimate gauge gain during combat

Relic Description: Partial HP Restoration upon Post-Damage Attacks
Effect: Replenishes HP on hit for a short period of time after taking damage
Notes: Much stronger healing than other heal on hit effects. Amount of healing varies by attack performed. Does not stack with Hand of Malenia (which will take priority and has great healing effects).

Relic Description: Slowly restore HP for self and nearby allies when HP is low
Effect: Restores [MaxHP * 0.005] + 1 HP/s for 50 seconds when HP is below 20%
Notes: Regen stays even after you go above 20% HP

Relic Description: Art gauge fills moderately upon critical hit
Effect: Increases Ultimate Art Gauge by 5

Relic Description: HP restored when using cured meats, medicinal boluses, etc.
Effect: Restores 50 HP on consumption

Relic Description: Art gauge charged from successful guarding
Effect: Increases Ultimate Art Gauge by 1

Relic Description: Critical Hit Boosts Stamina Recovery Speed
Effect: Increases stamina recovery by 10/s for 15 seconds

Relic Description: Gesture "Crossed Legs" Builds Up Madness
Effect: Inflicts 10 madness buildup every 2 seconds
Notes: Exclusive to (Dark) Night of the Demon

Relic Description: Madness Continually Recovers FP
Effect: Recovers 2 FP/s for 25 seconds
Notes: Exclusive to (Dark) Night of the Demon

Relic Description: Continuous HP recovery
Effect: Recovers 2 HP/s
Notes: Exclusive to Blessed Iron Coin and Dark Night of the Fathom

Relic Description: Continuous FP Recovery
Effect: Recovers 1 FP/5s
Notes: Exclusive to Will of the Balancers

Relic Description: Rot in Vicinity Causes Continuous HP Recovery
Effect: Recovers 0.15% of max HP + 15 HP/s for 15 seconds after rot procs
Notes: Exclusive to Night of Dregs

Relic Description: Raised stamina recovery for nearby allies, but not for self
Effect: Increases allies' stamina recovery speed by 4/s

Relic Description: FP Restoration upon Successive Attacks
Effect: Recovers [MaxFP * 0.05] with continuous attacks

Relic Description: HP Recovery From Successful Guarding
Effect: Recovers 8 HP after blocking an attack

Relic Description: Defeating enemies fills more of the Art gauge
Effect: Increases Ultimate Art Gauge by 5 on each enemy kill

Relic Description: Defeating enemies restores HP for allies but not for self
Effect: Allies recover 20 HP on each enemy kill

Relic Description: Stamina Recovery upon Landing Attacks +0/+1
Effect: Restores 2/3 stamina with continuous attacks
Notes: Stack with the weaker version. +1 Exclusive to (Dark) Night of the Beast

Relic Description: HP restoration after [Weapon type] attacks
Effect: Restores 15 HP with continuous attacks
Notes: Amount of healing doesn't seem to change based on attack / weapon type.

Relic Description: FP restoration after [Weapon type] attacks
Effect: Restores 2 FP with continuous attacks
Notes: Amount of healing doesn't seem to change based on attack / weapon type.

Relic Description: HP Restoration upon Thrusting Counterattack
Effect: Restores [MaxHP * 0.025] HP on counterhits

Relic Description: Wylder: Art gauge is greatly filled when ability is activated
Effect: Increased characterSkillGauge by 18

Relic Description: [Wylder] Art activation spreads fire in the area
Effect: Ultimate art leaves behind a small area of fire that does DoT.

Relic Description: [Wylder] Standard attacks enhanced with fiery follow-ups when using Character Skill (greatsword only)
Effect: Allows you to perform a light attack follow up after using claw shot. Adds 12 fire AP to the weapon

Relic Description: [Wylder] +1 additional character skill use
Effect: Self-explanatory

Relic Description: [Guardian] Increased skill duration
Effect: Allows you to briefly charge this skill to trigger a much bigger AoE and longer lasting tornado. Can block projectile attacks.

Relic Description: [Guardian] Slowly restores nearby allies HP while Art is active
Effect: Allies restore [MaxHP * 0.1] + 12 HP/0.5s when ultimate is held

Relic Description: [Guardian] Creates whirlwind when charging halberd attacks
Effect: Performs a whirlwind attack after using halberd charged heavies

Relic Description: [Guardian] Successful guards send out shockwaves while ability is active
Effect: Sends out a shockwave when blocking an attack in the Iron Guard stance. 100 base physical attack

Relic Description: [Ironeye] Art Charge Activation Adds Poison Effect
Effect: Charged ultimate deals 300 poison buildup

Relic Description: [Ironeye] Boosts thrusting counterattacks after executing Art
Effect: Increases counterhit damage by 1.2x for 30 seconds

Relic Description: [Ironeye] Extends duration of weak point
Effect: Extends weak point duration from 17.5s to 22s

Relic Description: [Ironeye] +1 additional character skill use
Effect: Self explanatory

Relic Description: [Duchess] Defeating enemies while Art is active ups attack power
Effect: Increases damage by 1.15x for 30 seconds for each enemy killed while Ultimate is active

Relic Description: [Duchess] Improved Character Skill Attack Power
Effect: Duchess' Restage does 60% of total damage instead of 50%
Notes: In game testing suggest 20% damage increase

Relic Description: [Duchess] Become difficult to spot and silence footsteps after landing critical from behind
Effect: Self explanatory

Relic Description: [Duchess] Successive dagger attack reprises event upon nearby enemies
Effect: Deals extra DoT damage after completing a full light attack chain.
Notes: ~36/39/39% extra damage from 1h/ 2h/ powerstance attack chain

Relic Description: [Raider] Duration of Ultimate Art extended
Effect: Increases duration of the ultimate from 20 to 30 seconds

Relic Description: [Raider] Damage taken while using Character Skill improves attack power and stamina
Effect: Increases damage by 1.1x and maximum stamina by 1.2x for 20 seconds

Relic Description: Defeating enemies near Totem Stela restores HP
Effect: Restores [MaxHP * 0.5] on each enemy kill in the vicinity of Raider's ultimate

Relic Description: Improved Poise Near Totem Stela
Effect: Reduces incoming poise damage by 0.1x while in the vicinity of Raider's ultimate

Relic Description: [Revenant] Expend own HP to fully heal nearby allies when activating Art
Effect: Decreases current HP by 50% on ultimate usage to fully heal allies' HP

Relic Description: [Revenant] Trigger ghostflame explosion during Ultimate Art activation
Effect: Performs a ghostflame explosion on ultimate. 20 base magic damage

Relic Description: [Revenant] Strengthens family and allies when Ultimate Art is activated
Effect: Increases ally damage by 1.25x for 30 seconds after ultimate art usage

Relic Description: [Revenant] Power up while fighting alongside family
Effect: Helen provides 1 HP/s, Frederick provides 1.1x damage, and Sebastian provides 20% elemental damage negation

Relic Description: [Recluse] Collecting affinity residue activates Terra Magica
Effect: Creates a sigil that increases magic damage by 1.15x when standing inside, lasts 30 seconds
Notes: Cannot spawn a new terra magica while previous one is still active

Relic Description: [Recluse] Suffer blood loss and increase attack power upon Art activation
Effect: Ultimate deals [MaxHP * 0.2] damage to the player and increases damage by 1.16x for 30s
Notes: Applies on top of the built in ~15% damage increase from her Ultimate art

Relic Description: [Recluse] Activating Ultimate Art raises Max HP
Effect: Increases maximum HP by 1.5x for 30 seconds. After 30 seconds, buff stays until hit

Relic Description: [Executor] Character Skill Boosts Attack but Lowers Damage Negation While Attacking
Effect: Increases damage by 1.35x for 6 seconds and lowers damage negation by 40% for 5 seconds

Relic Description: [Executor] While Character Skill is active, unlocking use of cursed sword restores HP
Effect: Restores [MaxHP * 0.05] + 100 HP

Relic Description: [Executor] Roaring restores HP while art is active
Effect: Restores [MaxHP * 0.15] after using the roar attack in the ultimate

Relic Description: [Scholar] Prevent slowing of Character Skill
Effect: Slows the decay rate of the Analyze meter

Relic Description: [Scholar] Allies targeted by Character Skill gain boosted attack
Effect: Upon usage of the skill, allies targeted will gain 1.2x (physical) / 1.15x (elemental) damage for 30 seconds

Relic Description: [Scholar] Continuous damage inflicted on targets threaded by Ultimate Art
Effect: Enemies affected by the ultimate takes 15 dps for 20 seconds

Relic Description: [Scholar] Earn runes for each additional specimen acquired with Character Skill
Effect: Gain 1300 runes when analyzing a new enemy type (works like a bestiary). Scanning the same enemy type at a different location will not provide the runes. (needs additional confirmation)

Relic Description: [Undertaker] Activating Ultimate Art increases attack power
Effect: Increases damage by 1.18x for 40 seconds after activating ultimate

Relic Description: [Undertaker] Attack power increases by landing the final blow of a chain attack
Effect: Increases damage by 1.16x for 20 seconds after hitting final hit of R1/L1 chain

Relic Description: [Undertaker] Physical attacks boosted while assist effect from incantation is active for self
Effect: Increases physical damage by 1.19x for 60 seconds after applying an incant buff

Relic Description: [Undertaker] Contact with allies restores their HP while Ultimate Art is activated
Effect: Allies restore 30% of max HP + 100 HP if they make contact with the ultimate
